title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS TOYOTA LANDCRUISER 100 SERIES – FUEL MANAGER PRE-FILTER WATER SEPARATOR KIT

content.rendered:
WESTERN FILTERS TOYOTA LANDCRUISER 100 SERIES – FUEL MANAGER PRE-FILTER WATER SEPARATOR KIT

Western Filters Toyota Landcruiser 100 Series Fuel Manager Pre-filter Water Separator Kit available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Vehicle Specific Pre- Fuel Filter Water Separator Kit Suits:

  • Toyota Landcruiser (2000-2007) 100 Series
  • Diesel model fitted with a Single Battery

This Filter unit is to be used as a Pre Filter to separate water & contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality. Comes complete with very specific fitting instructions and mounting bracket so all of the hard work is done!

Kit Includes;

  • Fuel Manager 30 Micron Filtration Unit
  • Mounting Bolts, washers & nyloc nuts
  • 1x Mtr 1/2″ Quality Fuel Hose
  • Filter Mounting Bracket
  • 2x 1/2″ Straight Barbed fittings
  • 2x Blanking Plugs
  • 4x Hose Clamps
  • Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube)

To check out the full range of products available for your Landcruiser, CLICK HERE!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
